::Perndabot/The Galactors::

Perndabot laughs, looking at Biomass. The insulting was over, at 
least the insults that meant anything, and as he saw it, Biomass had 
gotten the short edge of the stick.

"I'm not the one with the hole in my chest," he says, putting away 
his launcher. "Do you want to continue this match or do you yield?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Galactor jet flies in from where they had picked up Banzai-Tron, 
landing near the Iron Fist. It splits up into seperate bots and all 
but Scrap rush off to watch the fight, leaving Scrap with Banzai-Tron.

"Need any help getting to the CR?" Scrap asks, a but frustrated at 
missing a good fight.
